nd services available by geographical sector. As at December 31, 2023, no single customer represents more than 10% of the Groups sales and 
services. Accounting policy for Operating segments 
Operating segments are reported in a manner consistent with the internal reporting provided to the chief 
operating decision maker (CODM), being the Management Team who is responsible for allocating resources and assessing 
performance of the operating segments. On the basis of its internal financial reports and given the Groups primary source

ties are accessible 
to persons with reduced mobility. As an example, the four main buildings in Louvain-la-Neuve are 
fully adapted for such people. If necessary, a 
constructive discussion is held with the person 
with reduced mobility in order to guarantee him 
or her a workspace where he or she can move 
around as independently as possible. Risks and Risk Management 
The risks and risk management of the protection
